## Heading

This filter drops everything within a `notes` container. It’s useful if you want to export your presentation (Beamer, revealJS) to a format which doesn’t know this container (and you don’t want your speaker notes to be published).

Example:

```
With this filter, this will be displayed

::: notes
And this won’t
:::
